channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump administration to pull Maine K-12 funding over trans athletes dispute
item.description: The move is a major retaliatory step indicating the lengths the administration is willing to go to force state governments to adhere to its executive ...

item.title: Trump administration overrode Social Security staff to list immigrants as dead
item.description: A senior executive who objected was marched out of his office and put on leave, while earlier warnings about the agency’s deaths database were ignored...

item.title: Far-right Republicans tease rebellion but fall in line when Trump asks
item.description: The House Freedom Caucus, which used to drive a hard bargain on spending, is facing an identity crisis and has capitulated when pressured by the presi...

item.title: On the road, Bernie Sanders rallies crowds for his ‘working class movement’
item.description: Sanders and Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez are hitting the road again for a series of rallies aimed at rallying Democrats and independents against Trump.

item.title: Trump’s military border surge takes shape along U.S.-Mexico frontier
item.description: Using military hardware typically reserved for missions overseas, the Trump administration looks to send a message that the status quo has changed.

item.title: JD Vance Was Right: Cheap Foreign Labor Is an “Addiction”
item.description: JD Vance pointed out in a speech that cheap foreign labor has become a “drug” for our economy. This hurts American workers through the wage and job co...

item.title: House Committee Pursues Missing Biden Administration Parole Documents
item.description: The letter follows repeated failures by the Biden administration to satisfy multiple requests and two related subpoenas. DHS now has a new opportunity...

item.title: Trump, defiant on tariffs, claims trade deals are in the works
item.description: The president is foreshadowing deals with multiple trading partners in an apparent effort to quell economic anxiety and prove his tariff plan is worki...

item.title: How Significant Is 100,000 Deportations?

item.title: Colombia and U.S. Sign Biometrics Deal on Migration
item.description: After a rocky start, Colombia and the U.S. are now committed to cooperate more on immigration. To read the rest of the article click here The post Col...

item.title: US markets have spiraled. Americans had doubts about Trump’s tariffs before that.
item.description: Recent polls showed Americans were wary of tariffs, even before the president launched his plan to realign the global trade order.

item.title: Trump says tariff policies ‘WILL NEVER CHANGE’ amid plunging stocks, Chinese response
item.description: The president’s sweeping tariff plan has thrown markets into chaos and risks sparking a global trade war.

item.title: Maryland Determined to Kill Off Critical Resource for Sheriffs and Public Safety
item.description: The 287(g) program, which trains local law enforcement officers to identify illegal aliens who wind up in their custody for other offenses, has been a...

item.title: ‘There are no guarantees’: Scott Bessent won't rule out a recession
item.description: He also said he isn’t worried about stock market turbulence, following the worst week in the market in two years.

item.title: Trump’s business acumen has long been his armor. It’s being put to the test.
item.description: The normally bullish Trump over the weekend declined to rule out the possibility of a full-blown recession as his tariff policies threaten to spark a ...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
